root.name: Root
root.description: Deep connection to community and harmony. You are motivated by belonging, peace, and creating safe spaces for others. Your 'bubble' centers on maintaining relationships and ensuring everyone feels included.

root_trunk.name: Root-Trunk
root_trunk.description: Balances connection with personal growth. You seek harmony while building your own capabilities. You develop skills that help you better support and connect with others.

trunk.name: Trunk
trunk.description: Focused on mastery and self-improvement. You are driven by the desire to become more capable and skilled. Deep knowledge and persistent practice define your approach to growth.

trunk_branch.name: Trunk-Branch
trunk_branch.description: Combines personal mastery with system impact. You develop expertise not just for yourself, but to create meaningful change in your organization or field.

branch.name: Branch
branch.description: Driven by impact and contribution. You think in systems and focus on creating lasting change. Your motivation comes from seeing how your work affects the broader picture.

branch_leaf.name: Branch-Leaf
branch_leaf.description: Merges impact with exploration. You create change through innovation and new approaches. You're motivated by both making a difference and discovering new possibilities.

leaf.name: Leaf
leaf.description: Energized by novelty and discovery. You thrive on new experiences, fresh starts, and exploring uncharted territory. Change and variety fuel your motivation.

leaf_root.name: Leaf-Root
leaf_root.description: Bridges exploration with connection. You seek new experiences that bring people together. Your adventures are more meaningful when shared with others.

low.description: Single-bucket focus. You prefer deep, concentrated engagement in one area at a time. Depth over breadth defines your approach.

medium.description: Balanced buckets. You manage a few key areas simultaneously, finding the sweet spot between focus and variety.

high.description: Multi-bucket juggler. You thrive with many simultaneous interests and activities. Variety energizes you.

low.description: Permeable boundaries. You deeply feel and absorb the energy around you. Work and life blend together naturally.

medium.description: Flexible boundaries. You can adjust your walls as needed, sometimes open, sometimes protected.

high.description: Strong boundaries. You maintain clear separation between different areas of life. You stay centered regardless of external chaos.

low.description: Selective input. You prefer targeted, relevant information when you need it. Quality over quantity in learning.

medium.description: Moderate input. You balance active learning with processing time. You seek information with purpose.

high.description: Wide input. You constantly gather information from many sources. Learning is like breathing for you.

low.description: Narrow output. You share selectively, when asked or when necessary. You process internally before expressing.

medium.description: Balanced output. You share appropriately to context. You know when to speak and when to listen.

high.description: Wide output. You actively share thoughts and ideas. Processing happens through expression and dialogue.

harmonious_nurturer.name: Harmonious Nurturer
harmonious_nurturer.description: You quietly maintain group harmony and support others behind the scenes. Your strength lies in deep, trusted relationships where you share insights when directly asked.

inspiring_connector.name: Inspiring Connector
inspiring_connector.description: You actively build community through enthusiastic sharing of experiences and stories. Your energy creates inclusive environments that motivate others.

grounded_analyst.name: Grounded Analyst
grounded_analyst.description: You focus on accuracy and depth, sharing expertise when consulted. Your credibility comes from consistency and precision rather than volume.

impactful_driver.name: Impactful Driver
impactful_driver.description: You push for results through clear communication of goals and data. Your persistent messaging and logical influence drive change at scale.

high.label: Pure Type
high.description: Your motivational pattern is clear and focused. You have a strong, dominant driver.

medium.label: Blended Type
medium.description: You draw from multiple motivational sources. Your flexibility allows you to adapt to different contexts.

low.label: Highly Flexible
low.description: You're motivated by many things equally. Your adaptability is your superpower.
